attributes.action: ensure culling is NOT the approach of choice to deal with foot and mouth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Foot and mouth is infectious but not deadly to animals.
Vaccination can control this disease.
Culling has a devastating effect on communities and the country as a whole.
This is a brutal, blunt instrument, which should not be used in the twenty-first century
